devdoc.details: This contract inherits from RentsModule and Ownable for management functions.

params.nonce: The nonce of the token to claim rewards for.

returns.newNonce: The new nonce after updating the token.

params.name: The name of the HousingSFT token.
params.smartHousingAddr: The address of the main SmartHousing contract.
params.symbol: The symbol of the HousingSFT token.

returns._0: The maximum supply of the HousingSFT token.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.rentPayment: The details of the rent payment.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: HousingProject Contract

claimRentReward(uint256).notice: Claims rent rewards for a given token and updates attributes.

getMaxSupply().notice: Returns the maximum supply of the HousingSFT token.

receiveRent((address,uint256)).notice: Receives rent payments, calculates, and distributes rewards.

rentClaimable((uint256,address,uint256)).notice: Calculates the amount of rent claimable for a given token.

smartHousingAddr().notice: The address of the main SmartHousing contract.

userdoc.notice: Represents a unique real estate project within the SmartHousing ecosystem.
